channel.title: What is the code to make an npc be in a specific place?
channel.description: what is the code to make an npc be in a specific place? or what do i do to get it to spawn in that specific place?[br][size=1]Posted on: March 10, 2007, 04:37:08 PM[/size][hr]someone help

item.title: What is the code to make an npc be in a specific place?
item.dc:creator: @legendzpker legendzpker
item.description:
@legendzpker wrote:

you have to change the cords in autospawn search for the id there and it will say codrds across form it thne across from it again eg npcid = 534 4421 3452 change the last 2

Read full topic
